nodes.text: Gojuni Motts-Danel was a male Weequay who married the Tarnab sandsculptor Tantagru Motts-Danel. During the final decades of the Galactic Republic, the couple became notable in the corporate art scene, and were known for their holography and abstract art.
Gojuni Motts-Danel was first mentioned in Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
